# Acknowledgements {.unnumbered}

In 2025 the summer school and textbook was supported by the NFDI4Microbiota, funded by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG, German Research
Foundation) – project number 460129525 (NFDI4Microbiota FlexFund grant 'EnterArchaeo' to James Fellows Yates and Christina Warinner).
